ChunkText: financing your studies students planning to study in the US with a student visa will need to show their ability to cover the expected cost of their education. there are some ways students can receive scholarships or funding opportunities from umbc to contribute to these costs.
ContextAfter: scholarships undergraduate students scholarships for undergraduate students are primarily offered at the time of admission, in the form of merit scholarships based on grades and test scores submitted with your application and scholars programs, which require a separate application to the specific program. some scholarships are offered for current students as well.
